charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. - Defendant who having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year,did knowingly possess in and affecting commerce firearms, to wit: a Smith and Wesson .38 caliber revolver and a Ruger .22 caliber revolver, which both had been shipped and transported in interstate and foreign commerce, in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Section 922(g)(1).(1)
18:922G.F Felon in possession of a firearm

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:922G.F Felon in possession of a firearm
